The Secret of Nitro Juice
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The Secret of Nitro Juice
By Nate Railsback on Friday, December 6, 2002 - 07:47 pm:

I've been trying for a long time to figure out exactly what Nitro Juice does, though I'm worried about messing around with it since none of my monsters seem to be able to stand the stuff. Has anyone discovered its secret? Or for that matter, has anyone ever found a breed of monster that DIDN'T hate Nitro Juice?

By John Hawley on Saturday, December 7, 2002 - 12:48 am:

The only thing I've ever seen that liked Nitro Juice was a Psiroller and I don't remember the exact breed.

By torey luvullo on Saturday, December 7, 2002 - 06:07 am:

early on, when i was looking for the "nuts oil" of mr3, i fed nitro juice every week to monsters, despite their dislike of it. it had no effect on the fatigue schedule, and, despite their dislike of it, had no seeming effect on their stress level [at least not enough for fleria to comment on it]. i did this for a period of 6 months with a couple of monsters - sorry, do not remember the breed; i was not looking for a breed specific effect.

By Anonymous on Friday, December 27, 2002 - 07:22 am:

I have just finished raising a Raiden which tolerated Nitro juice. As for its effect, I've seen it boost training a little, but maybe it was a coinicidence.

By knightspast on Monday, January 27, 2003 - 06:37 pm:

I used Nitro Juice on a mocchi who had a trait that made it always sleepy and it removed that trait.

By KalaragiOgyo on Saturday, April 12, 2003 - 03:54 pm:

I've raised a few monsters that liked Nitro Juice. My Kuririn, my Pteraden, and my Pancho all liked Nitro Juice. That's just personal experience. It might be different for other monsters of the same breed...I'm not sure.
